website_summaries.verdict: These high-protein meal replacement pucks are easy to carry on the trail, and pack a lot of vitamins, fiber and antioxidants.
pros: Lower sugar content than other brands.High-protein content satisfies hunger for hours
Wide variety of flavor profiles available
cons: Agave sweetener not suitable for all diet plans

customer_reviews.title: Tastes decent but only 6g of protein
customer_reviews.text: These are good but not as much protein as other bars. I tried these for the first time yesterday. They have a decent taste, no weird aftertaste, and will be very convenient when I'm on the go, but you should know there are other choices with more protein. I will probably stick with RX bars most often - they are less calories (210 vs 240) and have twice the protein (12 vs 6). But the puck will be a nice change from time to time. UPDATE - despite the above I have found that these pucks keep me feeling full for hours, more than RX bars.
customer_reviews.author: AMT

customer_reviews.title: 3-star review is ONLY for the seller HSI-NY, product is 5-star when bought elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: First I should state that these Protein Pucks are one of my favorite snacks and can actually be somewhat of a meal replacement bar due to the high fat and calorie count. This review is 3-stars ONLY because I wanted to give a warning to those looking to buy these. I bought from HSI-NY and received a bag that had the inside coated in some kind of oil. The outside of the bag was fine, but EVERYTHING inside was coated and that just shouldn't be.
customer_reviews.author: Kenton W. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: This tastes good but its not good for you
customer_reviews.text: This tastes good but its not good for you. They did that sneaky thing where they make it 2 servings per package. So you're getting 20 grams of sugar which is for women the entire daily recommended sugar intake by the AHA. (Men are 36 grams)
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Yuck.
customer_reviews.text: These have a lot of redeeming factors such as nutrition relative to competition and lasting fullness, but taste is not one of them. It's not often I am forced to spit something out rather than power through it and swallow, but this was one of those times. I couldn't finish any of the three flavors. Don't let that necessarily scare you away, as taste is subjective, but I can't personally justify giving this product a good score. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Debora W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome if you buy via manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these pucks, especially the peanut butter pucks. If you are a fan of bird seed, this is for you! I would give 5 stars if these came directly from the manufacturer, but the last two shipments I have received from this seller (HSI-NY) were stale and tasted like they've been sitting on a shelf for too long. I'm going to buy straight from the manufacturers website and pay for shipping - it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Merrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for workout, light meal, & traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty! Great for after workout snack or a light meal. Clean, wholesome ingredients in a package that makes it easy to grab and go. I find these particularly useful when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking
customer_reviews.text: My friend turned me onto these when I was visiting her in Spokane. I bought this multipack for a trip with friends to the Grand Canyon. For my everyday life these have too many carbs, for me but for a day of hiking they provide tasty nutrition even when they get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mcduffie

customer_reviews.title: DEEEEELICIOUS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 Puck in a coffee shop as a meal replacement and it worked—I was full & energized. The “Green” Puck is my favorite but decided to buy the combo box...giving some to friends, but not ALL!
customer_reviews.author: QueenAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great gluten free product
customer_reviews.text: My mom and daughter suffer from celiac. These pucks are perfect, they taste great, are filling and are great to have when traveling. I eat them a lot as well. Love these things.
customer_reviews.author: M. Warren

customer_reviews.title: I bought the variety pack to see which I liked the best
customer_reviews.text: I bought the variety pack to see which I liked the best. It would have to be almond butter and dark chocolate. The other two were ok. They're good for a quick snack to put food in your belly. They were shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sunseri

customer_reviews.title: Yummy & Healthy
customer_reviews.text: These are always in my bag for a quick bite when I can’t stop for a healthy lunch. They are good for you, hearty and taste great. Good with coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.  Good as meal replacement, supplement or MRE. Delicious and nutritious!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Amazing. Paleo all the way. Awesome as meal replacement and nutritional supplement. This is not a snck food however, think MRE, the minis can be though. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Dry, no flavor protein puck
customer_reviews.text: I have had other products from this company and all were good. But this coca cinnamon spice is horrible. Cant even begin to convey how much I wished I had never purchased it. Should be called "dry, no flavor protein puck"
customer_reviews.author: Miki McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Not the freshest
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are great for on the go. Very filling and great flavor. Not the freshest box of Protein Pucks, a little hard.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: I am a certified steak-and-eggs type of guy. But these guys are my go-to snack during the day. They have a very moist texture that is also very nutty. They do take a while to eat through as they are dense and heavy. The chocolate is abundant and of high quality. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Protein Pucks
customer_reviews.text: I used tonget to get this at the grocery, but no more Makes.a.good meal on hikes, easy and packs easier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not to professional
customer_reviews.text: Bars showed up but in a plain box. The last order actually said what was I. Box these were jammed into a seems like to small of a box
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my cafe and my customers love them! Extremely filling.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey

customer_reviews.title: PAID FOR 2 BOXES - GOT 2 PUCKS
customer_reviews.text: I paid over $80 for two BOXES of protein pucks. What I received was a massive shipping box filled with packaging and TWO PROTEIN PUCKS. TOTAL. I am trying to figure out how to either return these two pucks for a refund or get the remaining 30 that should have come with the 2 I got. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynn

customer_reviews.title: Quick meal
customer_reviews.text: I usually get these at the local coffee shop, but decided to save money and get them on line. The ones I ordered seem a little more stale like they’ve been around for awhile but otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: fourdugos

customer_reviews.title: Best High Protein Snack for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I love Protein Pucks. They are a healthy snack and give you energy on the go. All flavors are delicious. I had gotten them in a local coffee shop but they kept running low, so decided to order my own supply
customer_reviews.author: Barbee Q

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors
customer_reviews.text: I eat one for breakfast every morning with a fruit. They are dense and flavorful. One puck keeps me fueled until lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Very filling
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tasting protein/meal bar I’ve tried. They are very filling, too. The texture is that of a no-bake oatmeal treat. My only concern is the saturated fat is a bit too high.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Great zombie ration
customer_reviews.text: I'm switching to these from PowerBars, having loved PowerBars for almost two decades. These guys aren't as gaggingly sweet as PowerBars. When the zombie invasion comes, I could live on these.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E. Roesch

customer_reviews.title: Oil substance in main bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars but they showed up with an oil substance within the bag. Could not find that and of the packages opened by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were recommended to me by some people I was playing tennis ...
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended to me by some people I was playing tennis with. After finding them at a local grocery store (& really liking them) I opted to commit to buying a case. Since I often find myself craving them, I know that I will be purchasing them on a regular basis. They're super tasty & convenient to keep on hand. I like feeling like I putting something healthy in my body when I eat one & like the contrast of the textures of the different seeds/nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Vatne

customer_reviews.title: Taste great, nice consistency that's moist/ soft enough and packed ...
customer_reviews.text: Taste great, nice consistency that's moist/ soft enough and packed with yummy stuff that's good for you. Only downside is the packaging that is difficult to open, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Throw away snickers and unhealthy treats !!!
customer_reviews.text: This healthy alternative to powerbars is a must have . Considering all off the synthetic ingredients in a powerbar , this is as vegan as it gets . My family and I used consume a ton of junk . This product can serve as a meal replacement or a snack in between !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Raynaldo

customer_reviews.title: Meal-in-one 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is a meal-in-one! I carry one when I know I won't have time to stop for lunch. I never stop at eating half!
customer_reviews.author: garden therapist

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Packaged nicely and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Packaged nicely and tastes great. I like to take these skiing with me; just in case we don't make it to the lodge for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Koko Neher

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: Good quality protein bar. It taste much better than most. Plus, has no gluten
customer_reviews.author: Ginger D. Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Great for meal replacement or fuel replacement during hikes
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and nutrient dense. Great for meal replacement or fuel replacement during hikes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: One puck and cravings are gone!
customer_reviews.text: These pucks are great. They truly fill me up and last until the next meal. I love all three kinds.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I really didn't like them at all but I decided to break them ...
customer_reviews.text: These protein pucks taste very raw, I really didn't like them at all but I decided to break them up and put cinnamon on them with agave and baked them for about 20 minutes. It made it crunchy and tasted more like granola. Made it taste way better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dry and old?
customer_reviews.text: they were dry and crumbly like when they get too old.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Branson

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: Great healthy snack on the go! They are naturally sweetened with only 12g of sugar. I highly recommend these bars.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Paleo, gluten free, and 1 puck is filling ...
customer_reviews.text: Paleo, gluten free, and 1 puck is filling enough to be 2 separate snacks. Buy on Amazon to save $ for the win!
customer_reviews.author: orangetigerbite

customer_reviews.title: I love these as snacks
customer_reviews.text: I first had this product while on vacation and I saved the wrapper so I could order it when I got home. I love these as snacks. They're healthy and low calorie. If you haven't tried them, do so. And, the employee who packed my order sent me a personal note!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Womack-Weidner

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. Perfect breakfast on the go. Tasty, healthy, and shaped like a hockey puck.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a quick one to get a snack, full of flavor and nutritionally balanced
customer_reviews.text: Great for a quick on the go snack, full of flavor and nutritionally balanced
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Feeling healthy
customer_reviews.text: Healthy, filling and they hold me over for 5 hours or so. Love them for breakfast every day. I do eat a whole one, which technically, is 2 servings. Service has been great!
customer_reviews.author: Debb

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and tasty
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every 3 week and include them in my lunches in place of a sandwich
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Grundig

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️ Protein Pucks!
customer_reviews.text: We love Protein Pucks! This is our second time ordering... we will continue to order this product. Love the fact that this is healthy, good for you food.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good variety and very fulfilling
customer_reviews.text: The product is bigger than you think; it is quite fulfilling when you eat it as a snack
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The best. They tast amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love them they are filling and so good. I love seeds.
customer_reviews.author: GRitter

customer_reviews.title: I love these bars
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars! Healthy and not too sweet, which makes them my top choice. I get tired of the "candy" protein bars. These are the perfect grab and go option for me!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sibelius

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and a great snack that will fill you!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Totally love these. I love all the flavors
customer_reviews.text: Totally love these. I love all the flavors. Highly recommend them but I recommend eating them after a work out or maybe a. Meal replacement they will stop you up if you eat to many. I'm so glad I found these 1st at the coffe stand and now Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Tasted even better than I thought it would! Very filling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars, I had tried it when my Brother from Washington state was in town and had to have my own.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Otey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love having a half of a puck with peanut butter on top great afternoon snack!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl a garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product. Great taste and size. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Great bars packed with good fats
customer_reviews.text: Great bars packed with good fats! Calories a bit high if you eat whole bar at once just FYI. Great taste, ingredients well done!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: This is my second box and Im very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: This is my second box and Im very happy with them, but I would like them to put the other flavors up for sale on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Bar Ever. Period.
customer_reviews.text: And I've tried them all. These are both a snack and a light meal substitute. They have helped me tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmoshopper

customer_reviews.title: A puck for your pocket
customer_reviews.text: Best bar puck I have ever had. It isn’t a diet item. About 250 calories for a 2.5 inch puck. It is an energy puck for hiking and when there is a need for high healthy calories. I use them when I ride horses, hike or travel all day and don’t want to carry food.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: The best protein bars ever!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Love these so much, I purchased two more boxes. These are great for tossing in a backpack for a hike! Will definitely purchase more in the future. YUMMM!
customer_reviews.author: Randy T. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Fat Bomb for breakfast
customer_reviews.text: This is really a delicious alternative for those wanting a fat bomb for a meal. Read about the Fat for Fuel approach to nutrition and this fits the bill. Slightly high for carbs, but the fat is good fat which makes these pucks good in my book.
customer_reviews.author: BuilderMike

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & Gluten Free
customer_reviews.text: I eat gluten free, and these are so good! Just pure ingredients (not sweet or chocolatey like a lot of bars are). They are very filling! I usually eat half and save the other half for an afternoon snack.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Peringer

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I love these! We split one every morning with coffee
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these! We split one every morning with coffee. Gives us energy that lasts thru our exercise to lunchtime! Good source of fiber as well. Tastes great too!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Puckin' Good
customer_reviews.text: The sunflower one (green) is yummy. The black one (peanut, cran, etc) has a bizarre after taste, so bad I had to give them away. Haven't tried the third flavor yet. Next time I would only order the green. They are very filling, convenient, and great for high protein diet. If concerned about sugar, I would avoid; the first ingredient is agave.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavors. Help tide me over until the opportunity to eat a meal. Excellent for when coaching track or playing golf.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Partner loves these
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been eating these myself, but I buy them for my partner who is both gluten- and dairy-free out of necessity. He is crazy for these!
customer_reviews.author: gingersnap642

customer_reviews.title: The Protein Puck is a terrific meal replacement for me which is gluten and cane ...
customer_reviews.text: The Protein Puck is a terrific meal replacement for me which is gluten and cane sugar free! A win/win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: gwk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was bought as a gift for someone that loves these.
customer_reviews.author: karen abruscato

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Addictive. These eat like whole food with very little filler. All the nuts and seeds make these very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: and these protein pucks are a perfect solution. Less sugar than most other protein bars
customer_reviews.text: I work long shifts, often without a break, and these protein pucks are a perfect solution. Less sugar than most other protein bars, and the texture and flavor are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey brain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality ingredients and tastes great. Only wish that it was organic.
customer_reviews.author: Brocante Elegance

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for healthy protein
customer_reviews.text: These taste great and are a good option for someone on the go. I eat them for breakfast frequently.
customer_reviews.author: M Barker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tasting, lots of calories, great for long hikes. Easy to digest. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great snacks to have...love them! Very filling and very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Gaaber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste and convenience of the protein pucks.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Esposti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite protein bar! Love all 3 green, orange and black!
customer_reviews.author: Chantal Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Product is excellent! I prefer to keep them handy as a quick meal replacement when I'm on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Kristofer P McLean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Tasty, stays together (travels well in my bag) and NOT greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Great flavors, very filling. Because each puck is 2 servings I would love to see these in single serving sizes!!!
customer_reviews.author: kathy arostegui

customer_reviews.title: buy this bar(puck)
customer_reviews.text: all good stuff in this puck as i am a fan of coconut i really like this
customer_reviews.author: pointrob

customer_reviews.title: these puck bars are @mazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love they are very filling as well as delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: alyssa delaney

product_meta.title: Protein Puck Bar, Original Peanut Butter Flavor, Gluten Free, Vegan, Non GMO, Fiber Rich, Non-Dairy, 16ct Case
feature_bullets: A HEALTHY INDULGENCE: Tired of dry, tasteless protein bars? Switch to Protein Pucks. These 16 high-protein snacks are deliciously sweet yet not too rich. So tasty they’ll become your favorite treat.
TRULY NUTRITIOUS: Forget those fake, sugary breakfast bars. Your Protein Puck health bars provide protein galore, along with fiber, vitamins, minerals, anti-oxidants & more.

NOTHING ARTIFICIAL: These natural vegan meal bars are pure and simple, containing only clean ingredients such as peanut butter, almonds, cranberries, oats & coconut. Gluten-free, dairy-free & non-GMO.
FILLING & SATISFYING: Do you often feel hungry just an hour after eating a breakfast bar? No more. Your Protein Puck will fill you up, stick with you & boost your energy all day.
MULTIPLE WAYS TO ENJOY: Treat yourself to these gourmet protein bars for breakfast, snacks & more. Perfect meal-replacement bar. A great way to eat healthy, build muscle & fuel your workouts.
